description.en-us: Dodge Van Debut series HW Drift Produced 2021 â€“ Present Designer Ryu Asada Number GRX21\n\nThe Dodge Ram Van , officially the B-Series, was a range of full-sized vans produced for the Dodge division of the Chrysler Corporation (later DaimlerChrysler) from 1971 to 2003. Despite being sold over three generations, the overall platform and most of the exterior sheetmetal remained unchanged over 32 years of production. The Ram Van was offered with numerous engines, from the 225 ci (3.7L) slant-6 to the 360 ci (5.9L) Magnum V8.
